mapper.select: SELECT a.*, r.*, ri.*, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM reservation resv JOIN soldout s ON resv.biz_id = s.biz_id AND resv.r_id = s.r_id WHERE resv.biz_id = r.biz_id AND resv.r_id = r.r_id AND TO_DATE(#{checkIn}, 'YY/MM/DD') <= TO_DATE(s.resv_date, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(s.resv_date, 'YY/MM/DD') < TO_DATE(#{checkOut}, 'YY/MM/DD') ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_reserved FROM accom a JOIN room r ON a.biz_id = r.biz_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM room_img ri1 WHERE ri1.r_img_id = ( SELECT MIN(ri2.r_img_id) FROM room_img ri2 WHERE ri1.biz_id = ri2.biz_id AND ri1.r_id = ri2.r_id ) ) ri ON r.biz_id = ri.biz_id AND r.r_id = ri.r_id WHERE a.biz_id = #{biz_id}
